Major_Arcs.title: Circus Arrives in Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus setting, featuring Paul Bunyan's performance, the townspeople's excitement, and their observation of the circus animals.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Performance
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Paul Bunyan and his circus act, showcasing his strength and showmanship.

sub_scenes.title: Town Excitement
sub_scenes.description: The townspeople react to the news of the circus arrival, expressing their anticipation.

sub_scenes.title: Observing Animals
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the circus grounds where people are observing the exotic animals.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the initial conflict at the circus, starting with sounds of trouble and escalating into a physical confrontation involving 'Billings/Grasso'.

sub_scenes.title: Sounds of Trouble and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Two men outside a tent hear sounds of trouble and decide to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Billings/Grasso Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Inside a tent, a confrontation unfolds involving 'Billings/Grasso', escalating from threats to physical violence and a pistol threat.

Major_Arcs.title: Recruitment of Paul Bunyan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the resolution of the conflict and the recruitment of Paul Bunyan as the new circus strongman.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman's Act and Owner's Plea
sub_scenes.description: A strong man performs an act and is approached by the circus owner who reveals Grasso's backstory and offers him a job.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Revenge and Bunyan's Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Matto Grasso's attempts to sabotage Paul Bunyan's success and Paul's heroic interventions.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Envy and Fire Plot
sub_scenes.description: Grasso observes Paul Bunyan's success with envy and plots revenge, deciding to set the circus tent on fire.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Tent Fire and Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A fire breaks out in the circus tent, and Paul Bunyan heroically intervenes to extinguish it.

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and Chase Begins
sub_scenes.description: Grasso, frustrated, plots to release a large ape, Gigantico, but Paul Bunyan intervenes and a chase for Grasso ensues.

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase and Grasso's Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the chase of Grasso through the circus arena and his eventual capture by Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Arena Chase and Failed Tricks
sub_scenes.description: The chase moves into the arena, where Grasso attempts to use various objects as obstacles but fails.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan
Bucket as a Trick and Continued Escape

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Trapeze Threat
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan captures Grasso and threatens to throw him onto a trapeze bar.

narrative_arcs.title: The Turn to Fight and Capture

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of the Circus Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the circus conflict with Grasso's capture, Paul Bunyan's job offer, and his decision to leave.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Throw and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan throws Grasso onto the trapeze bar, leading to Grasso's official capture.

narrative_arcs.title: The Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan is offered a permanent job but declines, choosing to return to the woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Talking Head
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Marco Polo and a fantastical encounter with a severed, talking head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Introduction and Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is introduced and encounters a mysterious cloaked figure.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback discovers a severed human head in the forest which then begins to speak.

Major_Arcs.title: The Magic Dagger and Mourning City
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc connects the man on horseback with a magic dagger and his arrival at a city in mourning.

sub_scenes.title: The Sacred Dagger
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback helps a tied man who gifts him a sacred dagger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment
The Question of the Knife's Inaction and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback arrives at a city initially mistaken for a festival but discovered to be in mourning.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus and the Ogress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Marco Polo in Hi-toun, his encounter with the King, and his journey to the Ogress's castle.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Welcome and Princess's Disappearance
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives in Hi-toun and is welcomed by the King, who reveals his daughter's disappearance.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Arrival and Royal Welcome
The King's Grief and Princess Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Plea from a Woman and Journey to Castle
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is approached by a woman pleading for help, leading him to her 'witch's castle'.

narrative_arcs.title: A Plea from a Starving Woman

sub_scenes.title: Castle and Ogress Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Inside the castle, the woman reveals her true form as an Ogress and attacks Marco Polo with monstrous mice.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Strange Children
Confrontation with Monstrous Mice and Sword Drawn

Major_Arcs.title: Defeating the Ogress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers a separate narrative segment where a man is attacked and captured, but uses a magic knife to defeat his captor, an ogress, and rescue Princess Lotus.

sub_scenes.title: Attack and Escape Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked figure attacks a man with magic, leading to the man's capture by magical snakes.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Ogress's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: The captured man and Princess Lotus are held by an ogress, but the man uses a magic knife to defeat her.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope

Major_Arcs.title: Reunion and Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the aftermath of the ogress's defeat, the reunion with Princess Lotus's father, and the man's departure.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Journey to Father
sub_scenes.description: The man and Princess Lotus escape the dungeon and travel to her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife
Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra - Setup and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story about a treasure in Agra, betrayal in a penal colony, and the protagonist's subsequent imprisonment and vow for revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: A prologue introduces a treasure tale followed by the setting of a British penal colony.

sub_scenes.title: Prisoner's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner offers Captain Brooking a share of a treasure in exchange for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner, Jordan, is betrayed by Captain Brooking, imprisoned, and vows revenge after his release.

Major_Arcs.title: Jordan's Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Joseph Jordan's pursuit of revenge against Captain Brooking, culminating in a deadly confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Vigil and Theatre Plans
sub_scenes.description: Jordan waits for Brooking, who is seen making plans for the theatre, unaware of Jordan's presence.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Attic Fight
sub_scenes.description: Jordan confronts Brooking, leading to a meeting at Brooking's house and a deadly fight in the attic over the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Resolution at Brooking's Home
Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: Aftermath and Moral of the Treasure Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the immediate aftermath of Brooking's murder, the police investigation, and a moral conclusion about treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation and Escape Attempt
sub_scenes.description: Police investigate the gunshot, discover the body, and Jordan attempts to escape capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Investigate Shot and Discover Body

sub_scenes.title: Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: An old man delivers a moral message about the corrupting influence of treasure.

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate - Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dr. Styx and the setup for a supernatural investigation at the Matthews Estate.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx Introduction and Matthews' Sentencing
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx is introduced in an ominous scene, followed by the sentencing of Vincent Matthews in court.

sub_scenes.title: The White Elephant Estate and Supernatural Expertise
sub_scenes.description: Henry Northrup consults Dr. Styx about the haunted Matthews Estate, and Dr. Styx offers his supernatural expertise.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Mr. Northrup's arrival at the haunted Matthews Estate and his confrontation with the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Warning and Entry
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup arrives at the haunted estate despite warnings and enters the house.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Hatred and Imminent Destruction
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup reveals his hatred to Vincent Matthews, leading to threats of destruction and physical confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Fight with Matthews
sub_scenes.description: A physical fight ensues between Mr. Northrup and the ghost of Vincent Matthews, with Northrup surprisingly displaying strength.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of the Haunted Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the haunted estate story by focusing on the spiritual resolution involving forgiveness, love, and the release of Vincent Matthews's spirit.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning and Confession
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked man questions a seated man about violence, leading to a confession of fear.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics
Confession of Fear and Societal Position

sub_scenes.title: Forgiveness and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man proposes forgiveness and love as a solution, revealing the seated man murdered his sister Rosalind.

narrative_arcs.title: The Solution of Forgiveness and Love
The Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder

sub_scenes.title: Love and Release
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man forces Vincent Matthews to face Rosalind, who offers forgiveness and brotherly love, leading to Vincent's release.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release

sub_scenes.title: Return to Normal World
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man returns to the living world, reassuring others that the house is no longer haunted.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's First Voyage - Failure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's first voyage to find the Northwest Passage, its failure, and his return to Holland.

sub_scenes.title: Henry Hudson Prologue
sub_scenes.description: A prologue sets the stage for Henry Hudson's story and his mysterious fate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Dutch East India Company Proposition and Acceptance
sub_scenes.description: The Dutch East India Company proposes a voyage to Hudson to find the Northwest Passage, which he accepts.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: Hudson River Exploration and Return
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's voyage faces crew tension, explores the Hudson River in hope, but ultimately returns to Holland in failure.

narrative_arcs.title: Rising Tensions and a Turn Southward
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Second Voyage - Mutiny
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Hudson's second voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice, rising crew discontent, and the eventual mutiny against him.

sub_scenes.title: New Voyage and Ice Entrapment
sub_scenes.description: Hudson embarks on a second voyage, but his ship gets trapped in ice, leading to crew frustration.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course

sub_scenes.title: Mutiny and Hudson Set Adrift
sub_scenes.description: The crew mutinies against Hudson, overpowers him, and sets him adrift in a small boat, leading to their eventual arrest.

narrative_arcs.title: Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson
Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight - Rescue Mission Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Hassan, the Arabian Knight, and sets up his mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from Tartar horsemen.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is introduced in a chase scene, pursued by Tartar horsemen while carrying a girl.

sub_scenes.title: Caliph's Summons and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is summoned by the Caliph and tasked with rescuing a kidnapped woman from Kurgan and the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Setting Off and Oasis Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Hassan sets off on his mission and discovers Tartar tracks at an oasis.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Warning and Tartar Camp Approach
sub_scenes.description: Hassan receives a warning from a traveler but continues to approach the Tartar camp.

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight - Infiltration and Challenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his discovery of the kidnapped woman, and his capture leading to a challenge by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Sentry Ambush and Disguise
sub_scenes.description: Hassan ambushes a sentry, takes his cloak as a disguise, and infiltrates the Tartar camp.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp and Confirmation of the Daughter

sub_scenes.title: Contact and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Hassan contacts the prisoner, who is revealed to be his aide, but is then detected and captured by Tartar soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is brought before Kurgan, who interrogates him and proposes a challenge of fighting three warriors for a chance at freedom.

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight - The Contest
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the contest where Hassan, unarmed, fights three Tartar warriors, using unconventional tactics to win.

sub_scenes.title: Contest Begins and Initial Strategy
sub_scenes.description: The contest begins, and Hassan reveals his strategy of using dirt as a weapon.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Start of the Contest
Dirt as a Weapon and Initial Attack
Exploiting the Advantage and Close Combat

sub_scenes.title: Sword Fight and Decisive Throw
sub_scenes.description: Hassan engages in sword fight and uses a decisive throw to defeat another opponent.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Negotiation
sub_scenes.description: After winning the contest, Hassan negotiates with Kurgan for the release of the woman and safe passage.

Major_Arcs.title: Arabian Knight - Resolution and Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Arabian Knight's story with farewells, clarifications, and a budding romance between Hassan and the rescued woman.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan bids farewell, and the woman clarifies her earlier actions to Hassan.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Questioning and Kiss
sub_scenes.description: An emotional exchange between Hassan and the woman leads to a kiss as a reward for his bravery.
